Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's been almost three hours and still no sign of the oasis...", 4: '1'}
{2: "I figured as much. It's not that easy to find...", 3: '8'}
{3: 'Tired of the unchanging yellow sands outside, you recline and close your eyes to rest.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What are you planning to do when you get back to Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Relax and rest up first...', 3: '11', 4: 'Right back to the grind again...', 5: '12'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Sounds good. Take a break to recover from this journey.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Is your work at Babylonia that heavy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Anyway, your help was crucial in dismantling Schneider's group.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The Forsaken will always welcome you with open arms.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're welcome.", 3: '16'}
{2: 'What about you? Any plans to rest after this mission?', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No, I hardly have any time to rest.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Because there's always something going on with the Forsaken?", 3: '19'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah. I mean, I bet the Gray Ravens keep you up at night, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Now that you mention it, I haven't contacted them since my transmitter died..."}
{3: 'Watanabe chuckles lightly, in a slightly teasing tone.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So, it's best we stay on our respective battlefields.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Wait, what's that?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The vehicle, which has been moving at a constant speed, suddenly comes to a halt. You open your eyes and see a tiny green point on the distant horizon.'}
{2: 'Is it another mirage?', 3: '30'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Mirages hover above the horizon. Their height doesn't change.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it the real deal this time?'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Let's go check it out.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe turns the steering wheel and drives straight toward the green spot.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{3: 'As you get closer, the green area becomes clearer until a lush oasis appears before you in the desert.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{3: 'As you step out of the vehicle, a fresh, woody scent fills the air.'}
{3: "A few desert foxes lie quietly in the grass, shrubs encircling the lake like lace on a forest fairy's dress, and the emerald green lake is as clear as a giant gem, reflecting specks of light."}
{3: 'As you approach the Oasis, a few white birds take flight, soaring across the azure sky before disappearing into the forest.'}
{3: 'Watanabe reaches his hand into the lake, his black steel hand effortlessly breaking the calm surface, causing ripples to spread across the water.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Looks like it's real this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We finally found it.', 3: '53'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Want to rest here for a bit? The water is surprisingly clean.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You crouch down, mimicking Watanabe's gesture, and dip your hand into the lake. The cool sensation slowly creeps up your body, easing much of your fatigue."}
{2: 'It feels refreshing, even revitalizing.', 3: '57'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Then let's stay here for a while. A little break won't hurt.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You and Watanabe sit by the lake, quietly observing this oasis in the desert.'}
{3: 'The desert foxes notice the new visitors but merely glance lazily before resuming their nap in the bushes.'}
{3: 'The fish that have fled you slowly return, swimming as if flying through transparent air, casting only faint shadows on the lakebed.'}
{3: "It's easy to forget that peaceful corners like this still exist in the world when you've spent so much time on gruesome battlefields."}
{3: "Here, there's no threat from the Punishing Virus, no endless human scheming, no constant fear for tomorrow. Only the basic laws of nature are quietly in operation."}
{3: 'Even in the barren sands, life thrives.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "【kuroname】, I'm glad you made it back safely.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You turn to see Watanabe gazing intently at you, his eyes filled with complex emotions beyond words.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've walked a long path, met many people, and bid farewell to many more.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'To save more people, I chose to become the leader of the Forsaken. But once I became the leader, I realized that I had to make even more decisions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Because everyone places their lives in my hands, I constantly question myself. Is this the right choice? Have I lived up to their expectations?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Have I really honored... their sacrifices?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz602.jpg'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "Don't mourn the dead with sorrow, Watanabe."}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Let them become your power to carry on.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory55.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: "I'll be back here in an hour...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "...It'll be fine, Watanabe.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "You watched my son die in front of you. Aren't you his best friend? Aren't you going to fight for him? Will you really forgive these bastards?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: '...What about my hope? There are tens of thousands of soldiers like me, abandoned, stranded on the surface. What about our hope?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "I still can't forgive... Hmm... Maybe the person I can't forgive is myself...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Go back... kid. Someone needs to remember us...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Never let this land... forget that we once fought for it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg901_4.jpg'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Attention to all Forsakens. Prepare to evacuate the space station immediately!'}
{2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: 'Roger!'}
{2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: 'Mr. Watanabe, the evacuation route has been sent to you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg901_5.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_10.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Can I ask you one last favor?'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Please tell Watanabe that the little crybaby who used to be a burden...'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: '...Can now protect others too.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_06.jpg'}
{2: 'Backhaus', 3: "It's too early for you to be here, you little brat."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiMemoryInformation.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Thank you for trusting me back then, and for coming back safely.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Even though it's just a thought, if I were to make another mistake and let you bear the consequences alone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The cost would be too high for me to bear.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe's hand, holding the old tag, is trembling slightly."}
{3: 'The tag, inscribed with "Watanabe", is rusted and worn, clearly not from this era.'}
{3: 'Sensing the hidden unease beneath his calm facade, you reach out to grab his hand.'}
{2: 'None of what happened was a mistake.', 3: '134'}
{2: 'They chose to entrust their tomorrow to you and willingly became the "cost."', 3: '135'}
{2: 'And as survivors, it\'s our duty to bear the cost of these "mistakes" together.', 3: '136'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg901_5.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory426.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory734.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Scenes of aircraft falling from the space station, the burning flames in Pulia Forest Park, and soldiers battling at the edge of the Hetero Zone forest flash through your mind.'}
{2: "I've made mistakes too, and it's thanks to countless sacrifices and protection that I'm still here today.", 3: '148'}
{2: 'So from now on, let me share your burdens and worries.', 3: '149'}
{2: "Whatever choices you make, they're never just for yourself.", 3: '150'}
{2: 'But for all of us survivors, together.', 3: '151'}
{3: "Hearing these resolute words, the ice in Watanabe's golden eye begins to melt, like a frozen lake thawing in the spring."}
{3: 'His palm is warm, silently conveying his emotions.'}
{3: 'You clasp your hand that is covering the tag in his palm.'}
{3: "You want him to know that he's never alone in his decisions."}
{3: "You don't want him to bear all the responsibility alone."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Yeah, I don't know why I forgot that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe also grabs onto your hand. His grip is gentle yet firm.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We have always been a team, doing everything together. Every life is inscribed with the trust of others.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We... are never alone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I won't ask this question again, because even sorrow itself... contains the weight of life.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He gently pats your shoulder, as if to brush off the dust from your cloak.'}
{3: 'His gaze is brimming with a tenderness that no one has ever seen before.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '【kuroname】, we must all live on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I will always remember this sorrow. As one who lives, I must remember how they fought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'And to honor their trust, we must see the day Earth is restored to their memory.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It will return to how it once was.', 3: '169'}
{2: 'And their stories will always be remembered.', 3: '170'}
{2: 'As long as Earth exists... And as long as human civilization endures.', 3: '171'}
{3: 'Sunlight filters through the leaves, casting irregular patches of light on Watanabe.'}
{3: 'A soft halo surrounds Watanabe. The scattered sunlight dances on his hair, shimmering with life.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So, to fulfill this promise, we must protect this place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Yes, absolutely, just like we've always done.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe stands up by the water and looks out at the endless plains as if finally making a decision.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He turns to gaze at you who is standing by the water, his eyes no longer confused. He then throws the old tag into the pool.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Let's go, 【kuroname】. It's time to leave for our next destination.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{3: 'The vehicle slowly leaves the oasis, the clear green colors gradually trailing behind until they become a tiny, indistinguishable dot.'}
{3: 'In the endless desert, the tracks you left are quickly erased by sand.'}
{3: 'You both know that the oasis is just a chance encounter and that, after this brief rest, you might never set foot there again.'}
{3: 'But to embark on a new journey is to find a new destination.'}
{3: "All the nostalgia for the past is left in that oasis, becoming memories forever sleeping at the lake's bottom."}
{3: 'To reach the promised tomorrow, the travelers of this desert set out on a new adventure.'}
